<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Changes to alignment shouldn&#39;t invalidated analyses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a1258a1ff55557c27684010ebd7283712">PreservedAnalyses::all</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
